column4: Hey guys, I know you're supposed to talk about compiz in #ubuntu-effects, but everybody seems to be AFK ... mind if I ask a minor queestion here?
u want to set Horizontal distance to 2 or however many u want, and leave the other values at 1 under general options in ccsm
the beginning of the guide http://forlong.blogage.de/article/2007/8/29/How-to-set-up-Compiz-Fusion explains how to get cube
try ctrl+alt+left mouse button drag to use the cube
make sure you have the cube plug-in enabled and also cube rotate plug-in, follow instructions from the link i gave you, and then restart X with ctrl+alt+backspace
viewport mouse switcher has nothing to do with it
all good now... just had to restart X!  Duh! lol
yes it is a good site, fishtank plugin, im guessing maybe try enabling the water plug-in ?
will do!  I'll let you help other noobs in need! thanks again

I lied.  One last question.  Compiz/Emerald will quit on me for seemingly no reason and I have to restart them both via compiz --replace and emerald --replace, respectively.  Do you know what's up with that?
